Title: Relates to requiring adult care facilities to include quality assurance committees and include a focus on infection control in such facilities' quality assurance plans
Summary: Requires adult care facilities to include quality assurance committees; includes a focus on infection control in such facilities' quality assurance plans.
LawCode: Amd ยง461-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring adult care facilities to include quality assurance committees and include a focus on infection control in such facilities' quality assurance plans
